text: Playa Coyote, formerly Puerto Coyote, is one of the secluded beaches in Costa Rica. It is on the Pacific side of the Nicoya Peninsula in the province of Guanacaste. It is on the beautiful and unspoilt Pacific coast. == Other websites == * https://playa-coyote.com Category:Beaches Category:Geography of Costa Rica
title: Playa Coyote
